reviews.review_text:
Tucked away in Verna Industrial Estate, Mom's Kitchen serves up homestyle Indian cuisine that lives up to its comforting name. The star of my recent visit was their chicken tikka biryani â€“ a masterful creation that ranks among the finest I've tasted. The fragrant long-grain rice was perfectly cooked, each grain separate and fluffy, while the chicken tikka pieces were succulent and infused with a complex blend of spices.

While the industrial estate location might seem unconventional for a restaurant, the quality of the food makes Mom's Kitchen well worth seeking out, especially for biryani enthusiasts.

The food here is really good!! It's hard to fine some good biriyani in Goa but this place serves one of the best available in Goa!! Must try is chicken biriyani and mixed fried rice... Quantity is a lot!! Better to take 1 for 2 persons!! Bit on the expensive side but it's definitely worth it.... Would easy recommend this for everyone!!

The restaurant serves very tasty and hygienic food, the presentation of food is very interesting. The staffs are very kind and cooperative. The have got a very good variety in their menu. The ambiance and feel of the restaurant is also good and pleasing. The order delivery is also very fast. The overall experience was very much satisfying and good.
